Articles.Content: How far does Kerbol's SoI reach? I know I'm on an escape trajectory, but I don't know whether I am out of Kerbol's SoI yet because the Patched Conics have failed and are not showing my course.
I'm pretty sure it does not have one yet, and as it is a star, it's SOI would be well beyond the outer planets anyway, just look at Voyager, it's only now at the edge of the solar system
No, I mean there is a definite point where orbit turns into escape trajectory. I have a craft on an escape trajectory, I just want to know where that point is.
It's an escape trajectory, but there is nothing to escape to, so you stay in Kerbol's SoI, perpetually drifting off.
